content.p: The University of Nottingham Malaysia is proud to invite you to our upcoming events. We offer unique opportunities for students and staff to engage and participate in the latest research in science and technology, pressing social and political issues and cultural and artistic events. Whether you’re interested in cutting-edge research, debates, dance and theatre performances, or just want to find out about university open days, you’re sure to find something that will pique your interest here. Our events are open to all students, and by attending them, you will have the opportunity to expand your horizons, meet new people and contribute to the vibrant intellectual community at the University of Nottingham Malaysia. So come join us for our upcoming events and be part of something bigger. We’re also running our University Open Day in several locations across the country throughout the year, so don’t miss out if you’re interested in finding out more about UNM. We look forward to seeing you there! Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia University of Nottingham Malaysia DULN001(B) telephone: +6 03 8924 8000 fax: +6 03 8924 8005 course enquiries: +6 03 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays)
